description: SFG COMET CORE is the central orchestration hub for SFG Aluminium's business operations, serving as the primary desktop and document management system. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, it integrates with five specialized MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers via AgentPass.ai for Sales, Finance, Operations, Communications, and Data management. The system features a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) Truth System powered by ChromaDB and PostgreSQL, storing all business rules and logic in a vector database for AI-queryable intelligence. COMET CORE manages the complete project lifecycle through six stages (New Enquiry, Viability Check, Pre-Production, Production, Final Inspection, Invoicing) with automated document numbering, anti-drift protection, and comprehensive audit logging. It provides real-time credit checking via Companies House and Experian integration, tier-based staff permissions (Tier 1-3 access control), and seamless integration with external systems including Xero accounting, Microsoft Graph for SharePoint/Outlook, Gmail, and Twilio SMS. The application serves as the single source of truth for all SFG Aluminium operations, orchestrating data flow between satellite applications and maintaining centralized business intelligence.
capabilities: Complete project lifecycle management with 6-stage workflow (New Enquiry → Viability Check → Pre-Production → Production → Final Inspection → Invoicing)
Automated document numbering system with anti-drift protection and verification (format: ENQ-YYYY-###, VC-YYYY-###, etc.)
Real-time credit checking and scoring via Companies House API with AI-powered financial analysis and automated alerts
RAG Truth System with ChromaDB vector database storing all business rules, logic, and operational intelligence for AI-queryable insights
MCP orchestration layer integrating 5 specialized servers (Sales, Finance, Operations, Communications, Data) via AgentPass.ai
Tier-based staff permissions and approval workflows (Tier 1: Sales, Tier 2: Management, Tier 3: Executive)
Comprehensive document management with S3 cloud storage, version control, and audit logging for all file operations
Real-time activity feed and notification system with Slack/Teams integration for team collaboration and updates
External API integrations (Xero accounting, Microsoft Graph SharePoint/Outlook, Gmail, Twilio SMS) with centralized credential vault
Advanced analytics dashboard with project metrics, conversion rates, stage duration analysis, and financial KPIs

workflows.name: New Enquiry to Quote Workflow
workflows.description: Complete workflow from initial customer enquiry through credit check, viability assessment, and quote generation
steps: Customer submits enquiry via email, phone, or web form
COMET CORE creates New Enquiry record with auto-generated ENQ-YYYY-### number
System triggers Companies House credit check and AI scoring
Credit results stored in RAG Truth System for future reference
Viability Check stage initiated with technical assessment
Quote generated with pricing, terms, and delivery timeline
Quote sent to customer via email with tracking
Status updates pushed to NEXUS and MCP-SALES

workflows.name: Project Approval and Production Workflow
workflows.description: Multi-tier approval workflow from quote acceptance through production initiation
steps: Customer accepts quote, triggering approval workflow
Tier 2 manager reviews and approves Pre-Production stage
Project details synchronized with Xero for financial tracking
Production team receives notification via Slack/Teams
Production stage initiated with material orders and scheduling
Real-time progress updates captured in activity feed
Document attachments stored in S3 with version control
All changes logged in audit trail for compliance

workflows.name: Credit Check and Risk Assessment Workflow
workflows.description: Automated credit checking with AI-powered risk scoring and decision support
steps: Credit check triggered from New Enquiry or manually by staff
Companies House API queried for company financial data
AI scoring engine analyzes financial health (Healthy/Moderate/Poor)
Credit results stored in PostgreSQL and ChromaDB vector DB
Risk assessment summary generated with recommendations
Alert notifications sent to sales team if risk detected
Credit history tracked over time for repeat customers
Results accessible via RAG system for future queries

workflows.name: Document Management and Audit Workflow
workflows.description: Comprehensive document lifecycle with version control and audit logging
steps: User uploads document via drag-and-drop interface
File validated for type, size, and security
Document uploaded to AWS S3 with encrypted storage
Metadata stored in PostgreSQL (filename, size, uploaded_by, timestamp)
Document linked to specific project and stage
Access controlled based on user tier permissions
All document operations logged in audit trail
Automatic notifications sent to relevant team members

workflows.name: MCP Orchestration and Data Synchronization Workflow
workflows.description: Real-time data synchronization across 5 MCP servers via AgentPass.ai
steps: COMET CORE receives data update from user action
Update validated against business rules in RAG Truth System
Event payload constructed with full context
Webhook sent to NEXUS orchestration layer
NEXUS routes event to relevant MCP servers (Sales, Finance, etc.)
MCP servers process event and return confirmation
COMET CORE updates local database with synchronized data
Success/failure logged with retry logic for failed webhooks
